Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You ware walking along Waterfront Way, south of the Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The large corn fields cover most of the northern landscape that you see before you. The Fields provide corn for all the agricultural and civilian needs year round. The excess corn is stored in silos to the east, south of the Klondike Wheat Fields. The Oceancrest Stables are located to the south where you can leave your steeds and walk around town freely.
